headline: Perfect Day secures $100M for scaling vegan cheese production
summary: Series C funding fuels expansion of precision-fermentation dairy alternatives.

headline: Geltor partners with food giant for vegan collagen rollout
summary: Major partnership accelerates market adoption of precision-fermentation collagen.

headline: Redefine Meat launches 3D-printed vegan steak in US supermarkets
summary: First major US retail launch of cellular agriculture-based meat alternative.

headline: Modern Meadow unveils bio-fabricated leather with improved durability
summary: Significant breakthrough in bio-fabricated leather strength and lifespan.

headline: Clara Foods secures funding for large-scale egg white production
summary: Precision fermentation-based egg whites poised for wider market penetration.
